author: Chris Reed
description: We build LEGO Ideas: The Goonies, a near-perfect set. It's big, it's fun to assemble, and it contains minifigures of the entire main cast and accounts of all the major set pieces from the film.
title: We Build LEGO The Goonies, Featuring Every Major Character and Functional Booby Traps

author: Eric Song
description: These are the best dedicated gaming earbuds of 2025.
title: Save 37% Off the Steelseries Arctis Gamebuds Earbuds for PlayStation 5 and PC

author: Jessie Wade
description: After a surge of popularity across streaming and social platforms, Canadian streaming service Crave and HBO Max announced the renewal of Heated Rivalry, the blockbuster hockey romance drama for a second season.
title: Heated Rivalry Gets Renewed for Season 2 at HBO Max

author: Eric Song
description: From a price to performance standpoint, it's obvious which deal to choose.
title: This Sonos Arc Soundbar Costs $500 Less Than the Arc Ultra, and You Can Still Get it By Christmas

author: Meg Koepp
description: New to Expedition 33? Get a rundown of what to expect in this article.
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Starter Guide - Beginner Tips, Systems Explained, and More

author: Eric Song
description: Still the best standalone VR gaming headset.
title: Amazon Is Giving Away $100 Credit When You Purchase a Meta Quest 3 VR Headset

author: Jordan Sirani
description: Wondering how to play the Resident Evil games in order? We're here to help break down the chronology of Capcom's survival horror franchise.
title: How to Play the Resident Evil Games in Chronological Order

author: Jacob Kienlen
description: Catch up on the book series ahead of the tv series.
title: How to Read the Percy Jackson Books in Chronological Order

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Nobody Wants This fans, Kristen Bell is about to do you one better than season 2. Netflix is adding Bell’s best-known role to their platform very soon — none other than Veronica Mars. However, there’s an interesting caveat to the whole situation.
title: Veronica Mars Is Coming To Netflix — But You'll Need a Few Streamers To Watch the Complete Series

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: If you, like me, still have visions of last night's grotesque trailer for a new Divinity game from Larian Studios burned into your head, then you'll be delighted to know there's already a whirl of fan theories as to what it all meant. Specifically, some fans think they've worked out who the man burned alive inside the wicker man is, or at least, who he's supposed to represent.
title: Fans Think They Know Who the Burning Man in the Divinity Trailer Is Supposed to Be

author: Chris Reed
title: Amazon's Exclusive Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Mirror Edition Is Still Available for PS5

author: coreydemoss
title: The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin Releases New Trailer at The Game Awards

author: Hannah Hoolihan
description: Xbox's new Fallout Pip-Boy Edition controller is now available to preorder from Amazon and the Microsoft Store. It's currently listed for $82.97 at each, with a release date of December 16 at Microsoft and January 7, 2026, at Amazon.
title: Fallout Fans Can Now Preorder Xbox's New Pip-Boy Controller

author: Tom Phillips
description: Frankenstein director Guillermo del Toro has discussed his now-cancelled plans for the DC universe, which included two years of work on a Justice League Dark screenplay, and the suggestion he could have helmed Superman movie Man of Steel.
title: Guillermo del Toro Reveals Scrapped Justice League Dark Plans That Included a Batman Cameo

author: Lex Briscuso
description: It’s hard to believe at this point but it’s true: Euphoria is coming back for Season 3, and HBO Max has released the first footage from the upcoming return.
title: First Footage of Euphoria Season 3 Released in Big HBO Max 2026 Teaser and We've Got Questions

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Gainax, the animation studio behind influential anime including Neon Genesis Evangelion, FLCL, and Gurren Lagann, officially shut down on December 10, 2025. This was revealed by Evangelion creator Hideaki Anno in a statement published on the website of his company Studio Khara, in which the anime director shared his personal thoughts on what he described as a “truly disappointing end” to Gainax’s “nearly 42 years’ of history.”
title: Neon Genesis Evangelion Studio Gainax Dissolved, Creator Hideaki Anno Speaks Out on 'Lack of Respect' and 'Truly Disappointing End'

author: Tom Phillips
description: Our first glimpse at footage from DC Studios series Lanterns has arrived, featuring Friday Night Lights' Kyle Chandler and Krypton's Aaron Pierre as members of the intergalactic Green Lantern Corps.
title: Here's Our First Teaser For DC Studios' Lanterns, Showing Its Heroes Driving Off a Cliff

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: 165 workers at id Software, the studio behind the Doom and Quake franchises, have elected to unionize with the Communications Workers of America (CWA) in yet another wall-to-wall developer union within Microsoft.
title: Doom, Quake Developers Form Wall-to-wall Union at id Software

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Amazon has pulled its AI-powered Fallout Season 1 recap after fans noticed it made significant errors ahead of the launch of Season 2.
title: 'Everyone Disliked That' — Amazon Pulls AI-Powered Fallout Recap After Getting Key Story Details Wrong

author: Tom Phillips
description: The Wizard World of Harry Potter is headed to Fortnite, as Epic Games offers Hogwarts Legacy for free via its PC Store.
title: Harry Potter Headed to Fortnite, as Hogwarts Legacy Offered Free on the Epic Games Store

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Microsoft exec responds to Call of Duty: Black Ops 7's disappointing launch.
title: 'Shipping a Major Franchise Like Clockwork Every Year Is a Really Difficult Task' — Microsoft Responds to Call of Duty: Black Ops 7's Disappointing Launch

author: Tom Phillips
description: Following official confirmation that Leon S. Kennedy will co-star in Resident Evil: Requiem, the game's developers have confirmed how much we'll be playing as the floppy-hair favorite — and it's good news for his fans.
title: Resident Evil: Requiem Developers Reveal How Much We'll Play as Leon — And Say The Survival Horror/Action Contrast Is Like Jumping Into a Cold Bath After a Hot Sauna

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Fighting game fans react after the cast of the Street Fighter movie joke about Mortal Kombat 2 at The Game Awards 2025.
title: 'I Don't Climb Over Others to Get Ahead' — Mortal Kombat Movie Producer Reacts After Street Fighter Cast Threw Big Shots at the Mortal Kombat 2 Cast | The Game Awards 2025

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Microsoft has confirmed plans for a significant Xbox Developer Direct showcase in January 2026 after a relatively quiet The Game Awards.
title: After a Relatively Quiet The Game Awards, Microsoft Says It Has a Packed Xbox Developer Direct Coming in January 2026

author: Rachel Weber
title: Official Nitro Deck 2 for Nintendo Switch 2 Now Available for Pre-Order

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: We just saw more of the Super Mario Galaxy Movie at The Game Awards, albeit not much more. We were just treated to a whopping 30 seconds of new footage, featuring Luigi smacking Bowser Jr. in the face. Cool!
title: Super Mario Galaxy Movie Gets a Whopping 30 Seconds of New Footage at The Game Awards, Featuring Luigi | The Game Awards

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 stormed The Game Awards 2025, winning all but one category it was nominated in, including the main prize: Game of the Year.
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Storms The Game Awards, Wins Coveted Game of the Year 2025

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 just swept The Game Awards, winning a whopping 11 out of 12 of its nominations, including Game of the Year. In celebration, Sandfall Interactive took the stage to announce that its previously-announced DLC for the game is out...now. Right now!
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33's DLC Is Out Now | The Game Awards

author: Michael Cripe
description: As revealed at The Game Awards 2025, Capcom is bringing the Blue Bomber back with a new video game called Mega Man: Dual Override.
title: Mega Man: Dual Override Revealed by Capcom With First Gameplay Trailer and 2027 Launch Plans | The Game Awards 2025

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Two and a half years after its reveal at a PlayStation showcase, Phantom Blade Zero now has a release date. It's September 9, 2026.
title: Phantom Blade Zero Has a Release Date at Last | The Game Awards

author: Michael Cripe
description: Bandai Namco sped into The Game Awards 2025 to finally reveal Ace Combat 8: Wings of Theve as the next entry in the long-running flight simulator series.
title: Ace Combat 8: Wings of Theve Announced for PC and Consoles in First Trailer | The Game Awards 2025

author: Tom Phillips
description: A brand new Star Wars racing game has been announced, from the makers of Burnout and Need for Speed.
title: Star Wars: Galactic Racer Announced, From Former Burnout and Need For Speed Developers | The Game Awards 2025 - IGN

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Creative Assembly has finally confirmed one of the worst-kept secrets in video games: Total War: Warhammer 40,000.
title: Total War: Warhammer 40,000 Announced From Creative Assembly | The Game Awards 2025

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The developer of well-received top-down action game The Ascent has revealed its next game and a shift in perspective to first-person.
title: The Next Game From the Developer of The Ascent Is Called No Law — and It Looks a Bit Like Cyberpunk 2077 | The Game Awards 2025

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: IGN interviews Neon Giant on No Law, fresh from The Game Awards.
title: The Developers of No Law Know Everyone Will Compare It to Cyberpunk 2077, but There Are Important Differences

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: As promised, Housemarque brought a new trailer for its Returnal follow-up, Saros, to The Game Awards today, and it included a release date of April 30, 2026.
title: Returnal Successor Saros Gets a New Trailer and Release Date | The Game Awards

author: Michael Cripe
description: Marvel Rivals is halfway through Season 5, but that isn’t stopping NetEase Games from revealing Deadpool as the first playable hero for Season 6 at The Game Awards 2025.
title: Marvel Rivals Season 6 Trailer Confirms Deadpool as Next Playable Character | The Game Awards 2025

author: Tom Phillips
description: Lords of the Fallen II publisher CI Games has shown gameplay footage of its Soulslike sequel during The Game Awards 2025, featuring new character Omeuras and enemy limbs flying everywhere.
title: 'Every Limb Can Be Removed': Lords of the Fallen II Publisher Discusses Dismemberment, Lore and Learnings for the Sequel | The Game Awards 2025 - IGN

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Blizzard has fully unveiled Diablo 4 expansion Lord of Hatred, confirming that it includes not one but two new classes — and the Paladin is playable now if you pre-purchase.
title: Diablo 4 Expansion Lord of Hatred Revealed, Adds Not 1 but 2 New Classes, Including the Paladin | The Game Awards 2025

author: Michael Cripe
description: Endnight Games showed up for The Game Awards 2025 with what may be one of the most unexpected announcements of the night: Forest 3 is coming.
title: Forest 3 Confirmed by Endnight as Sons of the Forest Follow-Up With First Trailer Trailer | The Game Awards 2025

author: Jacob Kienlen
description: It's cheaper than digital.
title: Why I'm Buying Dr. Seuss' How the Grinch Stole Christmas in 4K This Year

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Invincible VS has a character never before seen in Robert Kirkman’s superhero universe: Ella Mental. We interviewed Kirkman himself and the developers to find out how she fits into the overall universe.
title: 'She's Going to Be a Pivotal Part of the Story' — Invincible VS Has a Completely Original Fighter Just for the Game

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The next-gen, Unreal Engine 5-built Tomb Raider that developer Crystal Dynamics announced three years ago now has an official name and release window. Lara Croft’s new adventure for PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S is titled Tomb Raider: Catalyst, and it will be released in 2027 and published by Amazon Game Studios.
title: Tomb Raider: Catalyst Announced for 2027 and Tomb Raider 1 'Reimagining' Announced for 2026 | The Game Awards 2025

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight emerged from the shadows this evening at The Game Awards with a new trailer, revealing the anticipated adventure's release date.
title: LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight Release Date Announced | The Game Awards 2025

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: We just got our first look at the debut game from Nagoshi Studio, the studio formed by Toshihiro Nagoshi under NetEase after he departed Ryu Ga Gotoku in 2021. It's called Gang of Dragon, and it sure looks an awful lot like Yakuza!
title: Gang of Dragon is Toshihiro Nagoshi's New Game, and It Sure Looks Like Yakuza | The Game Awards 2025

author: Tom Phillips
description: Bruce Straley, game director of The Last of Us and Uncharted 4, has announced a new project, Coven of the Chicken Foot.
title: The Last of Us and Uncharted 4 Director Unveils Next Project Coven of the Chicken Foot | The Game Awards 2025 - IGN

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The Game Awards 2025 had a big Hollywood surprise: the debut trailer for the Street Fighter movie.
title: Debut Trailer for the Street Fighter Movie Shows Off Famous Special Moves and Even the Car Bonus Stage | The Game Awards 2025

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Remedy Entertainment has announced Control: Resonant, the follow-up to IGN’s 2019 Game of the Year, Control at the 2025 Game Awards. It’s due out in 2026 for PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X and S, and it aims to be anything but a straightforward sequel.
title: Control: Resonant Announced by Remedy for 2026 Release | The Game Awards 2025

author: Scott Collura
description: Review: Carol and Manousos hit some real lows in Pluribus Episode 7, “The Gap,” which is a beautifully shot and acted episode.
title: Pluribus Episode 7 Review, ‘The Gap’

author: Tom Phillips
description: After months of speculation and a revealing leak earlier this week, Capcom has finally, officially confirmed what we all knew: Leon S. Kennedy is in Resident Evil Requiem, and he's here to kick butt.
title: Capcom Finally Confirms Leon S. Kennedy Is In Resident Evil Requiem | The Game Awards 2025 - IGN

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The Dungeons & Dragons franchise has been steadily making more attempts to expand into video games, and we're seeing that next effort with Warlock: Dungeons & Dragons, a new open-world single-player action-adventure that's all about wielding dark magic to battle foes.
title: Warlock: Dungeons and Dragons Is a New Single-Player Action-Adventure That Leans Into 'Expressive Magic' | The Game Awards 2025

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Even after two years since its reveal at The Game Awards 2023, Archetype Entertainment's sci-fi action-RPG Exodus is still something of a mystery. Set in an original sci-fi universe from Wizards of the Coast – of Dungeons & Dragons fame – Exodus focuses on the accelerated evolution of human and alien civilizations, with players deciding the fate of different factions and humanity within the warring galaxy. Also, Matthew McConaughey will play a pivotal character who will guide players on that journey.
title: Exodus Resurfaces With 'Indiana Jones-Meets-Interstellar'-Type Adventure Vibe in New Trailer | The Game Awards 2025

author: Eric Song
description: Endgame headset.
title: The $600 SteelSeries Arctis Nova Elite Gaming Headset Sees Its First Discount Ever

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Capcom's upcoming space adventure Pragmata was back at The Game Awards today with some pretty significant news after years of delays. It has a release date at last: April 24, 2026.
title: Pragmata Gets Release Date, Demo, and Will Come to Nintendo Switch 2 | The Game Awards 2025

author: Tom Phillips
description: Davide Soliani, the lead creator behind Mario + Rabbids games, has revealed Bradley the Badger — his first new project since leaving Ubisoft and forming a new studio.
title: Mario + Rabbids Creator Davide Soliani Announces New Platforming Game Bradley the Badger | The Game Awards 2025

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: The Game Awards don't start for another half hour, but video game announcements are still finding a way to sneak in anyway. Compulsion Games just revealed that South of Midnight is coming to PlayStation 5 and Nintendo Switch 2 in spring of 2026.
title: Former Xbox-exclusive South of Midnight Is Coming to PlayStation and Switch 2
